attributes.action: Bonus Payment for Soliders at Olympics
attributes.additional_details:
The soliders that are told "we don't need you anymore" are going above any beyond there duty by helping the govenment out of another hole and working the security at the Olympic Games.
The Tube, Train and bus drivers are getting at least £500 for doing THERE job, so why can't the soilders be given this same minimum bonus for doing G4S's job?
Please sign, forward and make everyone aware.
